hero.title: From open roles to strong teams, we've got you covered

clientCentered.title: Client-centered approach
clientCentered.desc: A quick 15–20 minute call is all we need to clarify your goals and expectations. No time for a call? Just send us a voice message — we’ll adapt to your needs and schedule.

hiddenGems.title: Access to hidden gems
hiddenGems.desc: We find rare professionals — even those who aren't actively on the market. We use professional networks, referrals, and non-standard sourcing channels to build highly competent teams.

hrCommunity.title: Strong HR community & deep market knowledge
hrCommunity.desc: We stay on top of hiring trends and can help you create competitive offers that attract top talent and outpace your competitors.

aiSearch.title: AI-powered search & cutting-edge technology
aiSearch.desc: Our AI selects candidates tailored to your business in minutes. With a database of over 3,000 resumes, we deliver top specialists on the same day — and experts within two weeks.

identifyingNeeds.title: Identifying your needs
identifyingNeeds.desc: We start with a call to understand your current goals and business challenges.

aligningDetails.title: Aligning on the details
aligningDetails.desc: We prepare a detailed brief, define tasks and timelines, and sign the agreement.

deliveringSolutions.title: Delivering solutions
deliveringSolutions.desc: Depending on the format, we handle sourcing, interviewing, and setting up hiring processes.

presentingResults.title: Presenting results
presentingResults.desc: We deliver top candidates or a fully functional management system — with explanations, analytics, and recommendations.

supportingAllTheWay.title: Supporting you all the way
supportingAllTheWay.desc: We stay with you through every stage — from offer to onboarding and full process optimization.

sharingExpertise.title: Sharing our expertise
sharingExpertise.desc: Once the project is complete, we provide final analytics and clear guidelines for your independent future work.

fillingOpenRoles.title: Filling open roles
fillingOpenRoles.desc: Ideal for companies that need to quickly and reliably fill 1–2 positions without getting deeply involved in the process. We take full responsibility for selecting the right candidate to match your needs.

paymentOptions.1: 100% payment on the candidate’s first working day. Includes a 3-month replacement guarantee.
paymentOptions.2: 50% payment on the candidate’s first working day, the rest after the first month. No replacement guarantee.

recruiterOnDemand.title: Recruiter on demand
recruiterOnDemand.desc: Perfect for small companies without an in-house recruiter but with ongoing hiring needs. We handle the entire recruitment process for a fixed fee — no extra costs or need to add a new team member to your payroll.
includes: Management of up to 5 active vacancies per month
Job post costs — covered by us
Full-cycle recruitment: from writing the job description to onboarding

hrTeamOnDemand.title: HR Team on demand
hrTeamOnDemand.desc: Designed for companies without an in-house HR team that need to build effective people management. We handle employee onboarding, communication, and development — helping reduce turnover and boost engagement.
crmOptions: You can use your current system, or we’ll recommend the best solution.
At the end of the project, we provide post-project support on all HR-related matters.

recruiterPlusHR.title: Recruiter + HR Team
recruiterPlusHR.desc: Ideal for companies that need both ongoing recruitment and a full HR setup from scratch. A perfect choice if you're growing fast but haven’t yet built your in-house HR team.
includes: Everything from the “Recruiter on demand” and “HR Team on demand” services — combined in one solution.
A comprehensive approach: recruitment + building an efficient people management system.
